articles.description: Google has threatened to close its search engine in Australia — as it dials up its lobbying against draft legislation that is intended to force it to pay news publishers for reuse of their content. Facebook would also be subject to the law. And Facebook has p…
articles.content:
Google has threatened to close its search engine in Australia — as it dials up its lobbying against draft legislation that is intended to force it to pay news publishers for reuse of their content.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Walmart expands vaccinations in a boost to the U.S. Covid prevention program - CNBC
articles.description: Walmart is preparing to offer Covid-19 vaccinations in seven more states this week and next, a company spokeswoman told Reuters.
articles.content: Walmart is preparing to offer Covid-19 vaccinations in seven more states, as well as in Chicago and Puerto Rico, this week and next, a company spokeswoman told Reuters, expanding beyond the two state… [+1910 chars]

articles.title: Nissan boss says Brexit trade deal has given them a 'competitive advantage in UK and outside' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ashwani Gupta, the carmaker's chief operating officer, said he believed the last minute deal would 'redefine' the UK's auto industry. Pictured: The firm's Sunderland factory.
